thread.title: Gold nears five-year low in longest weekly losing streak in a decade

author: Bloomberg
title: Gold nears five-year low in longest weekly losing streak in a decade
text: Commodities Gold nears five-year low in longest weekly losing streak in a decade The precious metal continues to lose its shine as the greenback strengthens and a US rate rise looking increasingly likely Gold is losing its value Photo: REX By Bloomberg
